Name: Nabû-ēṭir

Wunsch 2014: "Double Family Names in Neo-Babylonian Records: The Case of the Ēṭiru and Ṭābihu Families and Their Butchers' Perbends", in Zoltán Csabai (ed.), Studies in Economic and Social History of the Ancient Near East in Memory of Péter Vargyas (Ancient Near East and Mediterranian Studies 2), Budapest, 751–787.
